                    java.lang.String name,

Normal constructor for an Income Record

Parameters:
amount - the specific amount in which this income record refers to
name - the name of this income record
remark - (s) for this income record, if any
date - the Date object in which this income record is created (not in this prog, but in user's context)
category - Category object in which this income is categorised to
